name: Noobles Basics In (Possible Epilepsy Warning?)
description: Possible epilepsy warning. Inspired by baldi. now just play. :o. Made for the GBTK game jam in under 48hrs, Bad game! The html versions skybox is red, the windows version is a wireframe grid, idk why. Also you can theoretically win this, i tried for an hour and couldn't win it though. didnt implement the theme though, didnt know what to do with the theme xP. Download the windows feature for more FPS.
